content: this sheer tank is knit bottom-to-top the suggested yarn is mohair but others work too 1 begin in the round separate front and back after armpit and return to knitting in the round later for the mock neck for the neat stripey effect use a variegated yarn size abbreviations us throughout the pattern are arranged as follows xs s m l xl xxl **materials ** needles sz 7 us circular needles yarn 1-2 50g skeins of lace-weight mohair yarn 431 450 482 520 558 584 yds for the example pictured i used the variegated rowan kidsilk haze colour in wine stitch holders or scrap yarn to hold stitches after separating front and back **gauge ** 4x4 square is 17 stitches across and 28 row tall in stockinette **measurements** please see the free hyperlinked pattern for more detail on measurements by size 1 https //www ravelry com/projects/ailecanne/jupiter-mesh-tank-2
